text: Stadion Miejski w Chorzowie is a multi-purpose stadium in Chorzów Batory district of the town Chorzów, Poland. Built in the years 1934-1935 for the successful Ruch Wielkie Hajduki team and currently is also used mostly for football matches and serves as the home of that club, now known as Ruch Chorzów. The stadium has a capacity of 9,300 people. == References == Category:Buildings and structures in Chorzów Category:Football venues in Poland Category:Multi-purpose stadiums in Poland Category:Sports venues in Silesian Voivodeship
title: Stadion Miejski (Chorzów)
